name: Unoh
overview: Unoh Inc. is an Internet technology company with the goal of Making fun and entertaining services for everyone in the world via internet. “Unoh”, in Japanese, literally translates as “right brain”. The right side of our brain is generally regarded to be responsible for creative and artistic thoughts. At Unoh, it strives to fully utilize the right side of its brain to produce fun and entertaining products and services on the Internet. Unoh firmly believes that the greatest benefit of the Internet is the potential it brings for creating and establishing new businesses with minimal resources. At Unoh, it works by the following principles in order to fully utilize this huge potential brought about by the Internet. Creativity: Constantly strive for creativity and innovation, and never simply imitate or copy others. Challenges: Take on new challenges that can only be overcome by us alone. Impact: Always strive to create new values with services that we provide. Above all, the company believes that the most important thing is to have fun in whatever it does.
